member.name: T:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility
member.summary: Utilidades para Html;

member.name: F:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.contentTypes
member.summary: Dicionário contendo as extensões e seus respectivos tipos de conteúdo.

member.name: M:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.TranslateContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Traduz a extensão do arquivo para um content/type.

member.summary: Extrai as palavras do HTML.

member.name: M:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.StripHtml(System.String)
member.summary: Recupera o texto contido no codigo html.

member.name: M:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.HtmlEntityEncode(System.String)
member.summary:
Based on the 'reflected' code (from the Framework System.Web.HttpServerUtility) listed on this page UrlEncode vs. HtmlEncode http://www.aspnetresources.com/blog/encoding_forms.aspx
PDF of unicode characters in the 0-127 (dec) range http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf
member.returns: & becomes & (encoded for XML Comments - don't be confused) 1-9a-zA-Z and some punctuation (ASCII, basically) remain unchanged

member.name: M:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.HtmlEntityEncode(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: whether to encode & < and > which will cause the entire string to be 'displayable' as HTML. true is the default value. Setting this to false will result in a string where the non-ASCII characters are encoded, but HTML tags remain in-tact for display in a browser.

member.name: M:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.HtmlEntityDecode(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts Html Entities back to their 'underlying' Unicode characters
member.returns: & becomes & (encoded for XML Comments - don't be confused) 1-9a-zA-Z and some punctuation (ASCII, basically) remain unchanged

member.name: F:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.entityResolver
member.summary: Static Regular Expression to match Html Entities in encoded text

member.name: F:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.entityLookupArray
member.summary: List of entities from here http://www.vigay.com/inet/acorn/browse-html2.html#entities

member.name: M:Colosoft.Web.ExtendedHtmlUtility.ResolveEntity(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match)
member.summary: Regex Match processing delegate to replace the Entities with their underlying Unicode character.
member.returns: & becomes & (encoded for XML Comments - don't be confused) and é becomes é
